entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 09:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NW 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
